problem.p: Where have you been particularly active in the course? You can check multiple boxes.

choice.name: reading
choice.text: I have done the majority of the reading.

choice.name: checkpoints
choice.text: I have done the majority of the checkpoint problems.

choice.name: homework
choice.text: I have done the majority of the homework.

choice.name: quizzes
choice.text: I have done most or all of the quizzes.

choice.name: wiki_edit
choice.text: I have edited the wiki several times.

choice.name: external
choice.text: I am in a study group for this course outside of the discussion boards.

choice.name: external
choice.text: I have not been particularly active.
